author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower brass nipple tips…I use MegaTape and pipe thread sealant over the threads. This ensures no water leaks inside the wall or at the brass cap. The brass nipple also serves as a placeholder for holes in porcelain or ceramic tiles 🔥#plumbing #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Brass Nipple Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
